price: "Danas vam neće biti ukora",reče, "Allah će vam oprostiti, On je najmilostiviji!"
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَثۡرِيبَ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ يَغۡفِرُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla lā tathrība ʿalaykumu al-yawma yaghfiru al-lahu lakum wahuwa arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
